original: Östergren, Karl Verner Sten, komminister, Längjum, f. 17/9/04- i Skäl-linge, Hallands 1. G. 40 m. Svea Maria Svensson. Barn: Lena Margareta f. 41, Sten Henric 44. — Teol. kand. Kom-min. i Längjum fr. 41. Ordf. i skolråd 0. kyrkostämma där.
translated:
Östergren, Karl Verner Sten, assistant priest, Längjum, b. 17/9/1904 in Skällinge, Halland County.

Married for 40 years to Svea Maria Svensson. Children: Lena Margareta b. 1941, Sten Henric b. 1944.

Acquired a Bachelor of Theology degree. Became an assistant priest in Längjum from 1941. Served as chairman of the school council and church assembly there.
